Description: Turn on/off national Gen Requirement. 2 turns on and applies constraint at busbar.
Select technology list for national generation standard (see inputs/national_generation/nat_gen_tech_frac.csv)
Select trajectory for national generation standard (see inputs/national_generation/gen_mandate_trajectory.csv)
switch to shrink valcap and related conditioning sets post-solve
Max number of times to iterate on a given solve year to achieve GSw_PRM_StressThreshold when using stress periods (0 means don't iterate; 1 means 1 extra ReEDS run; etc)
[TW-mile/year] maximum transmission capacity investment per year IN/AFTER firstyear_trans_longterm (constraint is OFF if set to 0 meaning unlimited trans investment; annual max since 2009 is ~3.64)
hierarchy level within which to allow new transmission lines
Choose the co2_tax input csv file (see inputs\emission_constraints)
CO2/CO2e emission cap. Turn off cap (0) or turn on CO2 only cap (1) or turn on CO2e cap (2) or include H2 leakage in CO2e cap (3)
Scenario for CO2 cap pathway (see inputs\emission_constraints\co2_cap.csv)
